src:
大眼正妹私售自拍無碼片被捕　網友肉搜私下竟是甜美鄰家女孩
02 Nov 2019, 09:26 by 網路創意組
雖然日本情色產業十分發達，許多女性會投入拍攝成人影片的行業，但日本有法令規定，若作品未經審查私自販售，就會處法而面臨刑責。日本四國愛媛縣警方日前便破獲一起無碼A片販賣案件，逮捕一名24歲大眼正妹，她被控自拍無碼色情片並在網路販售，賺取8,800日圓（約2,400新台幣），不過才賣出2片就被逮捕。
綜合日本媒體報導，遭到逮捕的正妹名為森河佳帆，容貌姣好且身材火辣，她在5月份時上網販售自製無碼A片，但沒多久就被警方在網路上巡邏時發現，愛媛縣警方迅速循線找到森河佳帆，並在她家中搜出10多片尚未出售的A片。


森河佳帆遭網友肉搜，發現私下如同鄰家女孩。（翻攝森河佳帆臉書）

警方表示，森河佳帆有一份正職工作，平常在從事汽車租賃、經銷、維修業務的公司上班，公司負責人是一名年輕人，而且在同一棟大樓經營另一家公司。附近居民透露，曾看過疑似援交妹、百萬名車在大樓周遭出沒，讓警方懷疑這起私售A片的案子背後恐怕由更大的集團操控。


森河佳帆遭網友肉搜，發現私下如同鄰家女孩。（翻攝森河佳帆臉書）

森河佳帆販售自製A片被逮消息曝光後，由於她有一雙明亮大眼、外型亮麗，立刻被網友肉搜，從她的臉書中可看到她穿著細肩帶衣服時上圍十分雄偉，而且形象清新樸素，如同一名甜美的鄰家女孩。
更新時間｜2019.11.02 09:25
text:
Big-eyed sister private sale self-timer without code is arrested. User meat search is actually a sweet girl next door.
02 Nov 2019, 09:26 by Internet Creative Group
Although the Japanese erotic industry is very developed, many women will invest in the industry of filming adult films. However, there are laws and regulations in Japan that if a work is sold without being censored, it will face criminal responsibility. Afghan police in the four countries of Japan have cracked a caseless A-selling case and arrested a 24-year-old big-eyed girl. She was charged with self-portraits and sold online, earning 8,800 yen (about NT$2,400). However, only two pieces were sold and arrested.
According to a comprehensive Japanese media report, the arrested sister named Senhe Jiafan, who looks good and has a hot body, sold her homemade codeless A film online in May, but it was not long before she was patrolled on the Internet. The Ehime County police quickly found Senhe Jiafan and found more than 10 unsold A films in her home.


Senhe Jiafan was searched by netizens and found privately as a girl next door. (Reflected by Senhe Jiafan Facebook)

The police said that Senhe Jiafan has a full-time job, usually working in a company engaged in car rental, distribution, and maintenance business. The company is headed by a young man and runs another company in the same building. Residents nearby revealed that they had seen suspected aids to the sisters and millions of cars in and around the building, and the police suspected that the case behind the private sale of A films might be controlled by a larger group.


Senhe Jiafan was searched by netizens and found privately as a girl next door. (Reflected by Senhe Jiafan Facebook)

After the news of the self-made A film sold by Senhe Jiafan was exposed, she had a bright and big eyes and a beautiful appearance. She was immediately searched by netizens. From her Facebook, she could see her wearing a thin shoulder strap. Very majestic, and the image is fresh and simple, like a sweet girl next door.
Update time|2019.11.02 09:25
